name: Marcus Chen
description: Met at the Global Tech Summit 2025. Marcus is pioneering decentralized AI infrastructure and shared incredible insights on the future of autonomous agents.

name: Sarah Jenkins
description: Sarah is building a revolutionary platform for carbon credit trading. We discussed potential collaborations on community-driven sustainability projects.

name: Alex Rivera
description: Alex is an expert in developer experience tools. Our conversation centered around the intersection of mental health and engineering productivity.
